title: Sun Transit in the 12th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 12th house for Scorpio Ascendant, focus shifts inward toward introspection, closure, isolation, and behind-the-scenes responsibilities. This phase highlights expenses, foreign connections, and work done away from public visibility. Energy may feel withdrawn, yet awareness of inner motives deepens. Ego can feel challenged due to lack of recognition, but this transit supports spiritual discipline and strategic planning. When pride is released, the period becomes powerful for rest, healing, and preparing for a new personal cycle.

sections.title: Inner Focus & Withdrawal
points: Focus on inner motives and awareness

sections.title: Expenses & Losses
points: Money spent on rest or healing

sections.title: Foreign & Distant Matters
points: Connection with foreign places or people
Work in isolated or distant environments

sections.title: Mental & Inner State
points: Low external drive but high awareness

closing: This Sun transit asks Scorpio Ascendants to step back and reset. Strength emerges through release, rest, and inner clarity.
